pricing.title: Service Pricing
pricing.description: View detailed pricing for membership packages and listing types on SmartRent

membership.title: Membership Pricing
membership.description: Membership packages are billed monthly, auto-renewed, and provide a fixed number of listings each month.

note.title: Note:
note.content: Listing allocations reset at the start of each month. Unused listings do not carry over to the next month.

basic.name: Basic Member
basic.description: Suitable for new agents or small inventory

standard.name: Standard Member
standard.description: Suitable for professional agents with 10+ properties

premium.name: Premium Member
premium.description: Suitable for agents with large inventory and marketing budget

vipGold.name: VIP Gold Listing
vipGold.description: Most prominent display, always at top, gold border and special badge

vipSilver.name: VIP Silver Listing
vipSilver.description: High priority display, silver border and prominent position

regular.name: Regular Listing
regular.description: Standard listing, displayed by post date and can be pushed to top

push.name: Push to top
push.description: Move your listing to the top for 1 hour

imageRights.name: Image copyright
imageRights.description: Protect your images from copying with watermark

schedule.name: Schedule posting
schedule.description: Schedule listings to post at optimal times

payment.title: Payment Guide
payment.description: Learn about payment methods and the purchase process

step1.title: Choose a service package
step1.description: Go to 'Membership' and select the package that suits your needs. Compare features and pricing to make the best decision.

step2.title: Select payment method
step2.description: Choose a suitable payment method: Bank card, E-wallet, or Bank transfer. Each method has its own advantages in speed and convenience.

step3.title: Confirm payment
step3.description: Review order details, discount code (if any), and total amount. Then proceed with payment according to the payment gateway instructions.

step4.title: Account activation
step4.description: After successful payment, the service package will be activated immediately. You can start using features and posting listings right away.

notes.title: Important Notes
notes.note1: Membership auto-renews monthly. You can cancel anytime.
notes.note2: Listing allocations reset at the start of each month and do not carry over.
notes.note3: Electronic invoices will be sent via email after each payment.
notes.note4: Contact hotline 1900-xxxx if you encounter any payment issues.

usage.title: SmartRent User Guide
usage.description: Detailed instructions on using the system to manage and post listings effectively

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started with SmartRent
gettingStarted.description: Basic steps to start using the system

step1.title: 1. Register an account
step1.description: Create a free account with email or sign in via Google. Complete your profile to increase credibility with customers.

step2.title: 2. Choose a membership plan
step2.description: Based on the number of properties you want to advertise, choose a suitable plan: Basic (15 listings), Standard (30 listings), or Premium (50 listings).

step3.title: 3. Start posting
step3.description: After purchasing a plan, you can start creating listings immediately. The system will guide you step by step to complete the information.

membership.title: Understanding Membership Plans
membership.description: How the membership plan system works

choosingPlan.title: Choose the Right Plan
choosingPlan.tip1: Basic Plan: Suitable if you have 10-15 properties to advertise
choosingPlan.tip2: Standard Plan: Best for professional agents with 20-30 properties
choosingPlan.tip3: Premium Plan: For agents with large inventory or need many VIP listings

monthlyAllocation.title: Monthly Listing Allocation
monthlyAllocation.description: Each month you receive a fixed number of listings according to your plan. Unused listings do not carry over to the next month.
monthlyAllocation.example: Example: Standard Plan = 30 listings/month. If you only use 25 listings this month, the remaining 5 will be lost when the new month starts.

posts.title: Creating and Managing Listings
posts.description: Detailed guide on listing types and how to create effective listings

types.title: Listing Types
types.vipGoldDesc: Highest priority display, always at top, gold border. Best for premium properties or urgent sales.
types.vipSilverDesc: High priority display with silver border. Suitable for mid-range properties needing more views.
types.regularDesc: Standard listing, displayed by post time. Can be pushed to top with free push credits.

bestPractices.title: Tips for Effective Listings
bestPractices.tip1: Use high-quality, well-lit photos from multiple angles (minimum 5-8 photos)
bestPractices.tip2: Write concise, eye-catching titles (e.g., '2BR apartment with river view in D7, great price')
bestPractices.tip3: Detailed description: area, rooms, furnishing, legal status, price, contact
bestPractices.tip4: Update accurate pricing, avoid overpricing or 'negotiable' only
bestPractices.tip5: Add videos or 3D/360° tours to increase credibility and views

pushing.title: Push to Top
pushing.description: Each membership plan includes free push credits. Use push to move regular listings to the top for 1 hour.
pushing.tip: Tip: Push listings during peak hours (9-11 AM, 7-9 PM) to optimize effectiveness.

editing.title: Editing listings
editing.description: You can edit title, description, photos, and price anytime. Listings will be updated immediately.

pausing.title: Pause/Hide listings
pausing.description: If the property is rented/sold, pause the listing to stop receiving contacts. Paused listings still count toward monthly allocation.

renewing.title: Renewing listings
renewing.description: Expired listings can be renewed for free if you have remaining allocation in your plan. Renewed listings will be pushed up as new.

customers.title: Customer Management
customers.feature1: Save contact information of customers who inquired about listings
customers.feature2: Categorize customers by status (new, consulting, successful)
customers.feature3: Notes and appointments with each customer

profile.title: Personal profile
profile.description: Update profile photo, phone number, address. Complete profiles increase customer trust.

notifications.title: Manage notifications
notifications.description: Choose to receive notifications via email, SMS, or push when customers contact you, listings are expiring, etc.

tips.title: Tips for Success
tips.tip1: Respond to messages/calls quickly (within 1-2 hours) to not miss customers
tips.tip2: Update listings regularly (at least once a week) to maintain freshness
tips.tip3: Use VIP packages for premium or urgent properties, regular for standard ones
tips.tip4: Join training courses and agent communities to learn from experience
tips.tip5: Track performance reports to know which listings get the most attention

paymentStatusPage.title: Payment Status
paymentStatusPage.subtitle: We are tracking your transaction. This page will update automatically.

completed.title: Payment Completed
completed.desc: Your payment was successful. Thank you!

pending.title: Payment Pending
pending.desc: Waiting for confirmation from the payment provider...

failed.title: Payment Failed
failed.desc: The payment was not successful. Please try again or use another method.

cancelled.title: Payment Cancelled
cancelled.desc: The payment was cancelled before completion.
